actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on N,N'N"-[(2,4,5-trioxo-1,3,5-triazine-1,3,5(2H,4H,6H)-triyl)tris[methylene(3,5,5-trimetyl-3,1-cyclohexanediyl)]]tris[hexahydro-2-oxo-1H-azepine-1-carboxamide].

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on N,N'N"-[(2,4,5-trioxo-1,3,5-triazine-1,3,5(2H,4H,6H)-triyl)tris[methylene(3,5,5-trimetyl-3,1-cyclohexanediyl)]]tris[hexahydro-2-oxo-1H-azepine-1-carboxamide].

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on N,N'N"-[(2,4,5-trioxo-1,3,5-triazine-1,3,5(2H,4H,6H)-triyl)tris[methylene(3,5,5-trimetyl-3,1-cyclohexanediyl)]]tris[hexahydro-2-oxo-1H-azepine-1-carboxamide].
